question: My father is a 76 year old diabetic with a progressively weakening heart.  He has had significant plaque buildup in his arteries which are in fact closing up. He just had his third mild heart attack this past week. He is experiencing further plaque buildup from his diabetic medication, which if he stops, he gets weak and sore muscles.His doctor states that he is not a candidate for surgery because of his weakened heart condition.  Is there not a "safe" procedure available to help clear his arteries effectively so that he is not threatened by these frequent attacks?  His doctor leaves us with the rather poor prognosis that he will continue to get these attacks and that there is nothing that can be done.  Is this a hopeless situation?--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Dear Bruce,Thank you  for your question.  Unfortunately a well known complication of diabetes is coronary artery disease.  It is generally due to the diabetes itself and not the medication that one takes for diabetes.  I can't comment specifically on your father's case but he may be a candidate for high risk surgery at a major heart center.  We routinely perform surgery in older diabetic individuals who need bypass surgery.If he is not a surgical candidate there are still other options such as angioplasty or percutaneous transmyocardial revascularization that he may be a candidate for.  If he is continuing to have symptoms he may consider seeking a second opinion as to his options.I hope you find this information useful.  Information provided in the heart forum is for general purposes only.  Only your physician can provide specific diagnoses and therapies.  Please feel free to write back with additional questions.If you would like to make an appointment at the Cleveland Clinic Heart Center, please call 1-800-CCF-CARE or inquire online by using the Heart Center website at www.ccf.org/heartcenter.  The Heart Center website contains a directory of the cardiology staff that can be used to select the physician best suited to address your cardiac problem.
title: Heart attacks, diabetic heart, plaque buildup
